data.text:
It had been a few days since we decided to work 
together on the 『Hero Search』 and I was meeting 
Zenno Rob Roy in the school library.
data.processed:
󠁿It had been a few days since we decided to work 
󠁿together on the 『Hero Search』 and I was meeting 
󠁿Zenno Rob Roy in the school library.

data.text:
……and so, with regards to our Hero, 
I decided to do some research on my own. Um――
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
󠁿……and so, with regards to our Hero, 
󠁿I decided to do some research on my own. Um――

data.text:
First, the time of day when Trainer-san met that Hero. 
It was probably during our free training period, right?
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
󠁿First, the time of day when Trainer-san met that Hero. 
󠁿It was probably during our free training period, right?

data.text:
At that time, lots of Uma Musume are entering 
and leaving, so it's hard to narrow it down 
based on individual course usage records……
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy

choices.text: So that's why we couldn't find anything……
choices.processed: <size=38>So that's why we couldn't find anything……</size>

choices.text: So that's why we couldn't find anything……
choices.processed: <size=38>So that's why we couldn't find anything……</size>

data.processed:
󠁿At that time, lots of Uma Musume are entering 
󠁿and leaving, so it's hard to narrow it down 
󠁿based on individual course usage records……

data.text:
Yes, I'm sorry…… t-then, how about changing our approach!? 
How about starting by visiting each of the training sites?!
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
󠁿Yes, I'm sorry…… t-then, how about changing our approach!? 
󠁿How about starting by visiting each of the training sites?!

data.text:
Normally, if they were using the course, they would 
be one of our students so…… if our Hero is there, 
you should be able to figure it out in a glance!
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
󠁿Normally, if they were using the course, they would 
󠁿be one of our students so…… if our Hero is there, 
󠁿you should be able to figure it out in a glance!

data.text:
Even if I'm the only one that thinks of them that way, 
there are plenty of girls I could call a hero! Um, for example――
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
󠁿Even if I'm the only one that thinks of them that way, 
󠁿there are plenty of girls I could call a hero! Um, for example――

data.text:
Even though everything she does seems 『A little mysterious』, 
she's actually a reeeeally smart Uma Musume……
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
󠁿Even though everything she does seems 『A little mysterious』, 
󠁿she's actually a reeeeally smart Uma Musume……

data.text:
Even though she always falls just one step short, 
she'll do everything in her power to keep up and close the gap.
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
󠁿Even though she always falls just one step short, 
󠁿she'll do everything in her power to keep up and close the gap.

data.text: ……and then, there's Symboli Kris S-san.
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: 󠁿……and then, there's Symboli Kris S-san.

data.text:
She's a senpai I look up to. 
Strong, fast, and cool…… and she's already debuted.
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
󠁿She's a senpai I look up to. 
󠁿Strong, fast, and cool…… and she's already debuted.

data.text:
Today, that Kris S-san should be running so…… 
shall we go take a look, Trainer-san!?
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
󠁿Today, that Kris S-san should be running so…… 
󠁿shall we go take a look, Trainer-san!?

data.text:
Just like usual, after school, the training course was 
crowded with students doing their free training.
data.processed:
󠁿Just like usual, after school, the training course was 
󠁿crowded with students doing their free training.

data.text:
Um, Kris S-san is…… Ah! Over there……! 
I-it looks like she's already running!
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
󠁿Um, Kris S-san is…… Ah! Over there……! 
󠁿I-it looks like she's already running!

data.text: Haa, haa, haa, haa――
data.name: Symboli Kris S
data.processed: 󠁿Haa, haa, haa, haa――

data.text:
Such innate strength. And such an overwhelming presence, 
however…… it seemed a little different from the Hero at that time.
data.processed:
󠁿Such innate strength. And such an overwhelming presence, 
󠁿however…… it seemed a little different from the Hero at that time.

data.text:
『She』 had more of a feeling that she would never let go, of 
desperation and tenacity, like she was obsessed with winning.
data.processed:
󠁿『She』 had more of a feeling that she would never let go, of 
󠁿desperation and tenacity, like she was obsessed with winning.

data.text: When I turned to Zenno Rob Roy to tell her this――
data.processed: 󠁿When I turned to Zenno Rob Roy to tell her this――

data.text:
The way she's stepping in…… it may look like she's 
relying solely on power, but that's wrong. It seems calculated……
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
󠁿The way she's stepping in…… it may look like she's 
󠁿relying solely on power, but that's wrong. It seems calculated……

data.text:
This is her approximate cooldown time…… and her icing time is on 
the long side? Kris S-san, she's managing her time very strictly.
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
󠁿This is her approximate cooldown time…… and her icing time is on 
󠁿the long side? Kris S-san, she's managing her time very strictly.

data.text:
While writing in her notebook, she was watching training 
with a serious look in her eyes. Her ears and tail 
flinched at the sound of the whistle.
data.processed:
󠁿While writing in her notebook, she was watching training 
󠁿with a serious look in her eyes. Her ears and tail 
󠁿flinched at the sound of the whistle.

data.text: Like this, it's almost like―
data.processed: 󠁿Like this, it's almost like―

data.text:
Eh!? Ah, no…… 
today I'm taking a break from free training!
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
󠁿Eh!? Ah, no…… 
󠁿today I'm taking a break from free training!

data.text:
But, we can continue the Hero Search next time…… Kris S-san 
doesn't seem to be the 『Hero』 that Trainer-san was looking for.
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
󠁿But, we can continue the Hero Search next time…… Kris S-san 
󠁿doesn't seem to be the 『Hero』 that Trainer-san was looking for.

data.text:
T-then…… I need to get going! 
I'll be heading off n-yow!
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
󠁿T-then…… I need to get going! 
󠁿I'll be heading off n-yow!

data.text:
She was gone in an instant…… I was planning on heading back too, 
but a familiar looking notebook was left behind on the benches.
data.processed:
󠁿She was gone in an instant…… I was planning on heading back too, 
󠁿but a familiar looking notebook was left behind on the benches.

data.text:
In a panic, she must have left this behind. 
For now, I opened it to confirm its owner――
data.processed:
󠁿In a panic, she must have left this behind. 
󠁿For now, I opened it to confirm its owner――

data.text:
It seemed to be about her observations of Symboli Kris S' 
training today. The page was completely filled.
data.processed:
󠁿It seemed to be about her observations of Symboli Kris S' 
󠁿training today. The page was completely filled.

data.text: Excuse me! I'm just wondering but, are you Rob Roy-san's――
data.name: Kind-looking Instructor
data.processed: 󠁿Excuse me! I'm just wondering but, are you Rob Roy-san's――

data.text:
I couldn't help but stare at the notebook. These pages were 
filled with such dedication. In that calm figure, where was she 
hiding all this passion?
data.processed:
󠁿I couldn't help but stare at the notebook. These pages were 
󠁿filled with such dedication. In that calm figure, where was she 
󠁿hiding all this passion?

data.text: Ah…… Ummmm～! Hello there!
data.name: Kind-looking Instructor
data.processed: 󠁿Ah…… Ummmm～! Hello there!

data.text:
No worries! Um, you were together with Rob Roy-san right!? 
Are you perhaps, Rob Roy-san's trainer!?
data.name: Kind-looking Instructor
data.processed:
󠁿No worries! Um, you were together with Rob Roy-san right!? 
󠁿Are you perhaps, Rob Roy-san's trainer!?

data.text:
Now that I think about it, talk about an exclusive 
contract with Zenno Rob Roy never came up. We 
were both just so focused on our Hero.
data.processed:
󠁿Now that I think about it, talk about an exclusive 
󠁿contract with Zenno Rob Roy never came up. We 
󠁿were both just so focused on our Hero.

data.text:
Ah, so that's not the case…… sorry for the sudden question. I 
tend to be in charge of Rob Roy-san's training often, but――
data.name: Kind-looking Instructor
data.processed:
󠁿Ah, so that's not the case…… sorry for the sudden question. I 
󠁿tend to be in charge of Rob Roy-san's training often, but――

data.text:
That girl, because of an injury, she's passed 
on several Selection Races…… And most of this 
time she hasn't seemed very energetic.
data.name: Kind-looking Instructor
data.processed:
󠁿That girl, because of an injury, she's passed 
󠁿on several Selection Races…… And most of this 
󠁿time she hasn't seemed very energetic.

data.text:
It's that time of year where most people debut so 
she might be getting impatient. The next Selection 
Race is still quite a ways off, after all.
data.name: Kind-looking Instructor
data.processed:
󠁿It's that time of year where most people debut so 
󠁿she might be getting impatient. The next Selection 
󠁿Race is still quite a ways off, after all.

data.text:
However…… maybe it's because of that, but it seems like she's 
performing worse than usual more often now.
data.name: Kind-looking Instructor
data.processed:
󠁿However…… maybe it's because of that, but it seems like she's 
󠁿performing worse than usual more often now.

data.text:
I talked to her about being more active in this year's Sports 
Festival so she could attract the attention of some trainers but――
data.name: Kind-looking Instructor
data.processed:
󠁿I talked to her about being more active in this year's Sports 
󠁿Festival so she could attract the attention of some trainers but――

data.text:
――But lately, it seems like she's doing less self training. 
I'm worried she might be losing motivation.
data.name: Kind-looking Instructor
data.processed:
󠁿――But lately, it seems like she's doing less self training. 
󠁿I'm worried she might be losing motivation.

data.text:
……because of that, when I saw you I thought 
『It's her trainer!』 and got so excited. I'm sorry.
data.name: Kind-looking Instructor
data.processed:
󠁿……because of that, when I saw you I thought 
󠁿『It's her trainer!』 and got so excited. I'm sorry.

data.text:
The instructor bowed deeply. Without a doubt, 
the reason her self training time was decreasing 
was because of the 『Hero Search』. However――
data.processed:
󠁿The instructor bowed deeply. Without a doubt, 
󠁿the reason her self training time was decreasing 
󠁿was because of the 『Hero Search』. However――

data.text: Eh?
data.name: Kind-looking Instructor
data.processed: 󠁿Eh?

data.text:
She probably has has her reasons for reducing her self 
training time in order to accompany me in the 『Hero Search』.

choices.text: She hasn't given up and isn't running away
choices.processed: <size=38>She hasn't given up and isn't running away</size>

data.processed:
󠁿She probably has has her reasons for reducing her self 
󠁿training time in order to accompany me in the 『Hero Search』.

data.text:
After all―― in the pages of this notebook she left behind, 
there was a strong impression of 『I want to get stronger』.
data.processed:
󠁿After all―― in the pages of this notebook she left behind, 
󠁿there was a strong impression of 『I want to get stronger』.

title: This Show's Not For Just Anyone
